## PathPointsControlsProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [PathPointsControls](./three-story-controls.pathpointscontrols.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PathPointsControlsProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [duration?](./three-story-controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.duration.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Transition duration, defaults to 1 |
|  [ease?](./three-story-controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.ease.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Transition easing, defaults to power1 |
|  [swipeThreshold?](./three-story-controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.swipethreshold.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Threshold of swipe distance that triggers a transition. Defaults to 60 |
|  [useKeyboard?](./three-story-controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.usekeyboard.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Use keyboard arrow keys as navigation, defaults to true |
|  [wheelThreshold?](./three-story-controls.pathpointscontrolsprops.wheelthreshold.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Threshold of wheel delta that triggers a transition. Defaults to 15 |
